  • SO: Windows 7
  • Procesador: Intel i3
  • Memoria: 4 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: 4 GB
  • DirectX: Versión 9.0
  • Almacenamiento: 15 GB de espacio disponible

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D compatible graphic card
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: intel core i3 2100 | AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 750 2gb | AMD rx 550 2gb

requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: intel Xeon E5 2640 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 960 2gb | AMD rx 560 2gb
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Version of Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or Vulkan compatible 3D graphic card with at least 1 GB of RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 compatible 3D graphic card with at least 2 GB of RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quadcore
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
